name: .WMT File Extension
summary: Learn about .WMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Virtual disk or Ramdisk file created by WinMount, a compressed file management program; stores a virtual hard drive tha can be mounted by the program; includes the volume format (FAT32, NTFS, Unformatted) as well as the disk size.

content: WMT files are used for mounting compressed archives to virtual disks. The archives can be in one of several formats, including .MOU, .ZIP, .ISO, and others.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
